synopsis.text: Ishidate and Ryokuoushoku Shakai join forces to create a captivating anime short, serving as a tribute to TOHO Animation's decade-long milestone. This visual masterpiece is part of the 'TOHO Animation Music Films' project, a unique initiative celebrating the studio's 10th anniversary. Among the five distinct collaborations between various artists and creators, this anime short stands out as the official music video for Ryokuoushoku Shakai's White Rabbit, promising a harmonious blend of music and animation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
